name: include
description: Include certain buttons. Buttons order will be as you type it. default: [all buttons]

name: exclude
description: Exclude certain buttons. if defined, these buttons will be excluded, default: [ ]

name: show
description: Number of buttons to show, if defined 'more' button will appear

name: title
description: Override title meta tag for LinkedIn and Reddit, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag for LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Telegram and Pinterest, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag for Pinterest only, default: null

name: tags
description: Override tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: redirectUrl
description: Override redirectUrl for Messenger (desktop), default: null

name: autoSetMeta
description: Initializes meta tag inputs from SEO meta tags, default: true

name: disabled
description: A boolean flag that indicates if share buttons clicks should be disabled

name: opened
description: Stream that emits when share window has opened

name: closed
description: Stream that emits when share window has closed
